titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for preuenting of the abuses growing by the vnordered retailing of tobacco
Proclamations. 1633-10-13
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: And by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Giuen at the Court at Whtehall the thirteenth day of October, in the ninth yeere of the reigne of our souereigne Lord Charles ..
Arms with 1 leaf under lions leg (arms 23)--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
